description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理。其父为前农业部副部长刘瑞龙。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and a Vice Premier of the State Council. Her father was Liu Ruilong, a former Vice Minister of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任农业部副部长，是刘延东的父亲。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice Minister of Agriculture. He is the father of Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东的姐姐，北京东方灵盾科技董事长兼总裁。
description.en: Sister of Liu Yandong, Chairman and President of Beijing Dongfang Lingdun Technology.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东的姐姐，曾任国家信息中心党办主任。
description.en: Sister of Liu Yandong, former Director of the Party Office of the State Information Center.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东的弟弟，香港皇裕国际董事。
description.en: Brother of Liu Yandong, Director of Hong Kong Huangyu International.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东的丈夫，摄影师，其父为前农业部副部长杨显东。
description.en: Husband of Liu Yandong, a photographer. His father was Yang Xiandong, a former Vice Minister of Agriculture.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东与杨元惺的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Liu Yandong and Yang Yuanxing.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大籍商人，刘延东的女婿。
description.en: Canadian businessman, son-in-law of Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任农业部副部长和中国科协副主席，是杨元惺的父亲。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Minister of Agriculture and Vice Chairman of the China Association for Science and Technology. He is the father of Yang Yuanxing.

description.zh-cn: 前中国共产党中央委员会总书记，曾与刘延东在共青团中央共事。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who worked with Liu Yandong in the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，刘延东在担任中共中央政治局委员期间向其负责。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, to whom Liu Yandong was subordinate during her tenure as a member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 前中华人民共和国国务院总理，刘延东在担任国务院副总理期间是其下属。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, under whom Liu Yandong served as Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央统战部部长，是刘延东的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, former head of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee, and Liu Yandong's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任共青团中央第一书记，与刘延东共事。
description.en: Chinese politician, former First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, who worked with Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替刘延东担任国务院副总理（分管教育、文化、卫生、体育）。
description.en: Chinese politician who succeeded Liu Yandong as Vice Premier of the State Council (in charge of education, culture, health, and sports).

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，是除刘延东外唯一一位连任的女性中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, the only female member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee besides Liu Yandong to serve consecutive terms.

description.zh-cn: 港澳商人，刘延东丈夫杨元惺的密友。
description.en: Hong Kong and Macau businessman, a close friend of Liu Yandong's husband, Yang Yuanxing.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，李嘉诚的密友，曾与刘延东女婿冯琦共同创办公司。
description.en: Hong Kong businesswoman, a close friend of Li Ka-shing, who co-founded a company with Liu Yandong's son-in-law, Feng Qi.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，周凯旋的密友。
description.en: Hong Kong businessman, a close friend of Solina Chau (Zhou Kaixuan).

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府，刘延东的母校之一。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher learning located in Beijing, China, and one of Liu Yandong's alma maters.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府，刘延东在此获得硕士学位。
description.en: A prestigious institution of higher learning located in Beijing, China, where Liu Yandong obtained her master's degree.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林长春的高等学府，刘延东在此获得博士学位。
description.en: An institution of higher learning located in Changchun, Jilin, China, where Liu Yandong obtained her doctoral degree.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军通讯工程学院

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西西安的高等学府，刘延东丈夫杨元惺的母校。
description.en: An institution of higher learning located in Xi'an, Shaanxi, China, and the alma mater of Liu Yandong's husband, Yang Yuanxing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市朝阳区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市朝阳区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市朝阳区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Chaoyang District, Beijing.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的全国领导机构，刘延东曾在此长期任职。
description.en: The national leading body of the Communist Youth League of China, where Liu Yandong served for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 中国各青年团体的联合组织，刘延东曾任其主席。
description.en: A federative body of youth organizations in China, where Liu Yandong once served as its chairperson.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部

description.zh-cn: 中共中央主管统一战线工作的职能部门，刘延东曾任其部长。
description.en: A functional department of the CPC Central Committee responsible for united front work, where Liu Yandong once served as its head.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的统一战线性质的政治学院。
description.en: A political academy of a united front nature led by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 为纪念宋庆龄而成立的公益组织，刘延东曾任其副主席。
description.en: A public welfare organization established in memory of Soong Ching-ling, where Liu Yandong once served as its vice chairperson.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的副职领导职务。
description.en: The deputy leadership position of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构，刘延东曾任两届委员。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China, where Liu Yandong served as a member for two terms.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成人员，是国家级副职领导人。
description.en: A member of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, holding a sub-national leadership position.

nodes.id: 第29届奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

zh-cn: 第29届奥林匹克运动会组织委员会

description.zh-cn: 负责2008年北京奥运会筹备和举办的机构。
description.en: The organization responsible for the preparation and hosting of the 2008 Beijing Olympic Games.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副职领导职务，协助总理工作。
description.en: The deputy leadership position of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, assisting the Premier.

nodes.id: 中国足球改革领导小组

zh-cn: 中国足球改革领导小组

description.zh-cn: 为推动中国足球改革而设立的领导机构，刘延东曾任组长。
description.en: A leading group established to promote football reform in China, once headed by Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 国际性的儒学学术文化团体，刘延东现任会长。
description.en: An international academic and cultural organization for Confucian studies, currently presided over by Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆北部的联邦共和国。
description.en: A federal republic in northern Eurasia.

description.zh-cn: 由周凯旋和冯琦共同创办的公司。
description.en: A company co-founded by Solina Chau and Feng Qi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期江苏省下辖的县，是刘延东的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Jiangsu Province during the Republic of China period, and the birthplace of Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东是刘瑞龙的女儿。
description.en: Liu Yandong is the daughter of Liu Ruilong.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东是江彤的女儿。
description.en: Liu Yandong is the daughter of Jiang Tong.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东与杨元惺是夫妻关系。
description.en: Liu Yandong and Yang Yuanxing are spouses.

description.zh-cn: 杨帆是刘延东的女儿。
description.en: Yang Fan is the daughter of Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 杨帆与冯琦是夫妻关系。
description.en: Yang Fan and Feng Qi are spouses.

description.zh-cn: 刘延淮是刘延东的姐姐。
description.en: Liu Yanhuai is Liu Yandong's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 刘延宁是刘延东的姐姐。
description.en: Liu Yanning is Liu Yandong's elder sister.

description.zh-cn: 刘延申是刘延东的弟弟。
description.en: Liu Yanshen is Liu Yandong's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 杨元惺是杨显东的儿子。
description.en: Yang Yuanxing is the son of Yang Xiandong.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东于1945年11月出生于江苏淮安。
description.en: Liu Yandong was born in Huai'an, Jiangsu in November 1945.

description.zh-cn: 1964年考入清华大学化学工程系学习。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Chemical Engineering at Tsinghua University in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央统战部副部长期间，获得中国人民大学硕士学位。
description.en: Obtained a master's degree from Renmin University of China while serving as Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department.

degree.zh-cn: 法学博士（政治学理论专业）

description.zh-cn: 在担任中央统战部副部长期间，获得吉林大学法学博士学位。
description.en: Obtained a Doctor of Law degree from Jilin University while serving as Deputy Head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 杨元惺毕业于中国人民解放军通讯工程学院（现西安电子科技大学）。
description.en: Yang Yuanxing graduated from the PLA Institute of Telecommunication Engineering (now Xidian University).

description.zh-cn: 于1964年7月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in July 1964.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市朝阳区委员会
中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

position.en: Secretary of the Secretariat, Executive Secretary

description.zh-cn: 历任中国共产主义青年团中央书记处书记（1982年12月－1991年3月）、常务书记（1988年5月－1991年3月）。
description.en: Served as Secretary (December 1982 - March 1991) and Executive Secretary (May 1988 - March 1991) of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.
Served as Vice Chairperson (April 1983 - April 1985) and Chairperson (April 1985 - December 1991) of the All-China Youth Federation.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会统一战线工作部

description.zh-cn: 历任中共中央统战部副秘书长（1991年3月－1991年9月）、副部长（1991年9月－2002年12月）、部长（2002年12月－2007年12月）。
description.en: Served as Deputy Secretary-General (March 1991 - September 1991), Deputy Head (September 1991 - December 2002), and Head (December 2002 - December 2007) of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 曾任第十七届、十八届中共中央政治局委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the 17th and 18th Politburo of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
中国足球改革领导小组

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在李克强担任国务院总理期间，刘延东任其副手。
description.en: While Li Keqiang was Premier of the State Council, Liu Yandong served as his deputy.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，刘延东是其中央政治局的成员。
description.en: While Hu Jintao was General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Liu Yandong was a member of its Politburo.

position.en: Member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央总书记期间，刘延东是其中央政治局的成员。
description.en: While Xi Jinping was General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, Liu Yandong was a member of its Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 在共青团中央工作期间，与时任团中央负责人的胡锦涛、王兆国、宋德福共事。
description.en: During her tenure at the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, she worked with Hu Jintao, Wang Zhaoguo, and Song Defu, who were then leaders of the league.

description.zh-cn: 在共青团中央工作期间，与时任团中央负责人的胡锦涛、王兆国、宋德福共事。后来，刘延东接替王兆国出任中共中央统战部部长。
description.en: During her tenure at the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, she worked with Hu Jintao, Wang Zhaoguo, and Song Defu. Later, Liu Yandong succeeded Wang Zhaoguo as head of the United Front Work Department.

description.zh-cn: 在共青团中央工作期间，与时任团中央负责人的胡锦涛、王兆国、宋德福共事。
description.en: During her tenure at the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, she worked with Hu Jintao, Wang Zhaoguo, and Song Defu, who were then leaders of the league.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东卸任中共中央统战部部长，由杜青林接任。
description.en: Liu Yandong stepped down as head of the United Front Work Department, and was succeeded by Du Qinglin.

description.zh-cn: 刘延东卸任国务院副总理，由孙春兰等人接任其分管领域。
description.en: Liu Yandong stepped down as Vice Premier of the State Council, and her areas of responsibility were taken over by Sun Chunlan and others.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯向刘延东授予友谊勋章。
description.en: Russia awarded the Order of Friendship to Liu Yandong.

description.zh-cn: 杨元惺是何鸿燊的密友。
description.en: Yang Yuanxing is a close friend of Stanley Ho.

description.zh-cn: 周凯旋是李嘉诚的密友。
description.en: Solina Chau is a close friend of Li Ka-shing.

description.zh-cn: 冯琦与周凯旋共同创办了TOM集团。
description.en: Feng Qi co-founded TOM Group with Solina Chau.

description.zh-cn: 周凯旋与冯琦共同创办了TOM集团。
description.en: Solina Chau co-founded TOM Group with Feng Qi.
